topic.title: Getting Started with MDHT for s

body.p: This getting started guide will walk you through the installation of MDHT All-In-One, and the exercise of setting up a new health care information model project based on Consolidate CDA model. Installation instructions apply to Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7 operating systems.

This guide is meant for CDA Implementation Guide Developers who need to create CDA Implementation Guides based on CDA R2. For a more complete walk through of the feaures see the CDA Implementation Guide Developer Users Guide
This guide is meant for CDA Implementers who need to create, consume, and validate CDA document instances based on a CDA R2 Implementation Guides
